original: Bengtsson, Anders Peter, komminister, Halmstad, f. 15/6/95 i Gbg av förste postiljon Karl B. o. Charlotta Pettersson. G. 28 m. Aina Tingdahl. Barn: Bengt f. 29, Birgit 30’, Barbro 35, Clas 36. — Stud:ex. i Gbg 15, teol. fil. ex. 21, teol. kand. samt prästv. f. Gbgs stift 24. Var. v. kommin. samt v. pastor i Kälv, Kungälv, Hjärtum, Bro o. Uddevalla, kommin. i Säve, kommin. i Halmstad sed. 38, pred. v. centr :las. i Halmstad sed. 42. Led. av kyrkofullm., kyrkoråd, barnav:nd o. lokala stift. f. barn o. trogna tjänare, jurjT-man. Skr.: pred. o. upps. i stiftsbok. Hobbies: musik o. sång.
translated: Bengtsson, Anders Peter, vicar, Halmstad, b. June 15, 1895 in Gothenburg, son of first postilion Karl B. and Charlotta Pettersson. Married in 1928 to Aina Tingdahl. Children: Bengt b. 1929, Birgit b. 1930, Barbro b. 1935, Clas b. 1936. — Graduated from high school in Gothenburg in 1915, received a Bachelor of Theology degree in 1921, became an ordained priest in the Gothenburg diocese in 1924. Served as an assistant vicar and deputy pastor in Kälv, Kungälv, Hjärtum, Bro and Uddevalla, a vicar in Säve, a vicar in Halmstad since 1938, and a preacher at the central church in Halmstad since 1942. Member of the church council, the local child welfare committee, and the local Christian fellowship. He was also a trustee. He has written sermons and essays in the diocese book. Hobbies: music and singing.

structured.name: Anders Peter Bengtsson
structured.description: Anders Peter Bengtsson was a Swedish vicar born on June 15, 1895 in Gothenburg. He was the son of first postilion Karl B. and Charlotta Pettersson. He was married to Aina Tingdahl in 1928 and they had four children - Bengt, Birgit, Barbro, and Clas. He graduated from Gothenburg High School in 1915 and received a Bachelor of Theology degree in 1921. He became an ordained priest in the Gothenburg diocese in 1924. He served as an assistant vicar and deputy pastor in Kälv, Kungälv, Hjärtum, Bro, and Uddevalla, a vicar in Säve, a vicar in Halmstad since 1938, and a preacher at the central church in Halmstad since 1942. He was a member of the church council, the local child welfare committee, and the local Christian fellowship. He was also a trustee. He has written sermons and essays in the diocese book. His hobbies included music and singing.
